abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32265571, pmid32267002, pmid32265540, pmid32265568, pmid32266993, pmid32268020, pmid32268022, pmid32267488, pmid32266375, pmid32266990, pmid32267220, pmid32266381, pmid32265541, pmid32267000, pmid32266995, pmid32266994
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.09
